name: Explore the Three Towers of San Marino
description: Visit the iconic Three Towers of San Marino, located on the peaks of Monte Titano, offering panoramic views and rich history.

name: Stroll Through the Historic Center
description: Wander through the narrow streets of San Marino's historic center, a UNESCO World Heritage site with medieval architecture and charming shops.

name: Basilica di San Marino Visit
description: Explore the Basilica di San Marino, a neoclassical church housing the relics of Saint Marinus, the founder of the Republic.

name: Piazza della Libertà and Public Palace
description: Visit Piazza della Libertà and the Public Palace, the heart of San Marino's political life and home to the changing of the guard ceremony.

name: Monte Titano Cable Car Ride
description: Take a cable car ride up Monte Titano, enjoying stunning views of the surrounding countryside and the Adriatic coast.

name: Museum of Curiosities Visit
description: Explore the Museum of Curiosities in San Marino, offering a collection of unusual and intriguing artifacts from around the world.

name: San Marino Nature Walks
description: Enjoy the natural beauty of San Marino's landscapes through various walking and hiking trails around the country.

name: Torture Museum Exploration
description: Visit the Torture Museum in San Marino, displaying historical torture devices and offering a unique perspective on medieval and Renaissance history.

name: State Museum of San Marino
description: Discover the State Museum of San Marino, showcasing archaeological finds, art collections, and historical artifacts representing the country's heritage.

name: Shopping in San Marino
description: Experience shopping in San Marino, known for its variety of shops offering everything from souvenirs to luxury goods, often at tax-free prices.
